com.se_project.models

Class MCQQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.se_project.models.Question
      • com.se_project.models.MCQQuestion

  • @Entity(name="mcqquestions")
public class MCQQuestion
extends Question
    The multiple choice question entity and it holds all the attributes of mcq question

    It has a relation ManyToOne with mcqgame
